duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage daily operations of first level support for AVer’s North & South America business.
Answer phone calls, emails, manage technical support platform, and manage RMA/DOA cases.
Collaborate with sales, marketing, and PMs to enhance total customer experience.
Coordinate incident flow throughout the lifecycle and assist in rolling-out fixes.
Ensure critical accounts are handled expeditiously and maintain customer satisfaction.
Lead, mentor, attract, retain, and manage junior support staff.

education_certification.credential: AS in Computer Engineering (or equivalent Enterprise IT experience)
